net.sf.mmm.content.parser.impl.text

Class ContentParserText

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentParser

    @Singleton
public class ContentParserText
extends AbstractContentParserText
    This is the implementation of the ContentParser interface for text (content with the mimetype "text/plain").
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    ContentParserTextMarkupAware
